about_the_game:
Welcome to GOVNOVOZ—a game where the world of waste management turns into an epic action-packed adventure filled with crazy mini-games, racing, and a hilarious story!

Story:

Grisha arrives in town to claim his father's inheritance, expecting riches or at least a nice apartment… but instead, he gets an old vacuum truck! To make matters worse, his father owed money to the entire local utility service, and the key bosses—Granny Zina, Uncle Vitya the Gasman, and Klava the Janitor—won't let him leave until he pays off the debts.

Now, Grisha has to hustle hard: driving passengers around in his sewage truck, maneuvering through tight parking lots, competing in chaotic obstacle races, outrunning pursuers, and even surviving in a rogue-like action brawl

Game Features:

✅ A hilarious story filled with satire about bureaucracy, government services, and city life.
✅ Dynamic mini-games inspired by classic arcade racers, Crazy Taxi, Vampire Survivors, and more.
✅ Racing, parking challenges, drifting, runner chases, survival modes, and many other wacky trials.
✅ Tons of pop culture references to movies, games, and internet memes.
✅ Memorable characters! Uncle Kolya, the wise trucker; Granny Zina, the witch of the utility office; and even Vin Drosel with his love for family and racing.

short_description: Become the king of the sewage business in this insane mix of racing, arcade mini-games, and a hilarious storyline! Transport passengers in your vacuum truck, drift through chaotic races, fend off a wicked utility worker, and uncover a conspiracy tied to ancient otherworldly forces.
